When did Linus Torvalds start work on Linux?
Extra Info: Mostly; Linux uses the same principles and basic ideas of Unix; but Linux itself doesn’t contain Unix code - it is an independent project.

# Question: Who launched the Debian GNU/Linux Project/When?
Extra Info: The Debian GNU/Linux distribution is the biggest distribution of the Debian distribution family.
The distribution has a scheduled release every six months with a long-term support release every 2 years.

# Question: GNU/Linux promotes Richard Stallman’s vision of
Extra Info: freedoms of the user to run; study; distribute and improve the software. This is why it does not provide any proprietary software by default.
Ubuntu was created by Mark Shuttleworth and his team in 2004; with the mission to bring an easy to use Linux desktop environment.
